<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/discount/{discount}/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint retrieves the details of a discount by its code.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"discount","required":true}]}
>

>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"statusCode":200,"message":"Success","discount":{"_id":"ObjectId","code":"DISCOUNT_CODE","reduction":20,"maxClaims":100,"expires":1699999999,"redeemed":["user1","user2"],"allowedPlans":["plan1","plan2"],"recurrent":false}}}}}}},"404":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"notFound":{"value":{"statusCode":404,"error":"Not found","message":"Discount not found"}}}}}},"500":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"serverError":{"value":{"statusCode":500,"error":"Internal server error","message":"Internal server error"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
